name: Buried!
description:
Buried is a game about escaping a trapped desert temple before being engulfed into a rapidly increasing quicksand. The player should find keystones to unlock doors to lead him to the exit!

This was made for Jame Gam #6.

Note: Game over UI doesn't work properly in fullscreen mode! Small window recommended.

Press R to restart.

Credits:

Programming: zoom377

Art/Designs:  tpxrules

Music: Miguel Abuel
